title: wikipedia-recsys
description: For fun and learning, I am building a recommender system for Wikipedia editors (aka Wikipedians) to suggest what article they should edit next, called WikiRecs. Iâ€™m especially interested in the interplay of timing and sequence of actions to predict what someone will do next in an app or on a website. There are several cutting edge AI techniques I am exploring to fully use all those sources of information, but from my background in science I knew that the first priority is trustworthy measurements, in this case via offline evaluation.
